name: Retro Music Racing
description:
You are a born racer and nothing can stop you! Retro Music Racing is a new retro race for fans disco 80s.

Music racing is the drive! Race to the horizon, fast cars and limited time - all this is Retro Music Racing, our new retro racing simulator and a song of style disco 80s. Now you are a famous racer, prepare for the races and you are waiting for incredible tests!

Features:
- Simple operation
- Colorful city
- Limited time
- Music race, you are waiting for a suitable song, or rather even a few
- Retro car
- A real drive!

Music racing is racing fun! Tired of finding the right music for the race? In our game there is already a song from the disco 80s, and it's perfect for retro races.
Racing with no challenge is boring racing. Racer, you have a certain time to complete the route. You can keep in it or you will come faster depends only on you!
Endless races! You will always have new roads, a song and a car for the races.

The racer, who loves disco 80s and musical races try your hand at our game Retro Music Racing!
